claims.claim: Interpreter and VM are observationally equivalent for the shipped corpora under the declared observation policy.
claims.metric: Pass/fail equivalence; counterexample program + normalized observations when failing

claims.claim: Baseline timings are computed reproducibly (per machine) for paired .py/.suay programs.
claims.metric: Median runtime across N runs per benchmark per backend

claims.claim: Evidence artifacts are integrity-checkable by SHA-256.
claims.metric: SHA-256 per artifact and environment metadata
